item.title: 据说 WeRide 将在美国 IPO 和配售中寻求高达 4 亿美元的融资
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国的 WeRide 公司正在美国首次公开募股和同时进行的私募中寻求高达 4 亿美元的资金。【原文：China’s WeRide Inc. is seeking as much as $400 million in a US initial public offering and concurrent private placement, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 页岩油产量增长令欧佩克头疼+
item.description:
美国钻探商最近一直在提高产量目标，而且看起来还将继续。【原文：

US drillers have been boosting production targets lately and look set to continue.

】

item.title: 中国央行研究缩小利率走廊计划
item.description: 中国央行表示正在研究一项计划，以缩小市场利率的浮动范围，从而发出更明确的政策信号。【原文：China’s central bank said it’s studying a plan to narrow the range within which market interest rates can fluctuate, as it looks to send a clearer signal on policy.】

item.title: 挪威认为国防开支扩大了长期财政需求
item.description: 据挪威财政部称，未来几年，挪威国防开支的不断增长将是导致预算缺口扩大的主要原因，其次才是人口老龄化问题。【原文：Norway’s growing defense spending will be the main driver of the projected widening in budget shortfall in the coming years, ahead of population aging, according to the country’s Finance Ministry.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。动荡不安的一周即将结束，关于股票、债券、央行和人工智能问题的下一步争论仍在继续。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. A turbulent week reaches a close with debates on where next for stocks, bonds, central banks and the AI story. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 青山湖承诺购买高达 10 亿美元的 Pagaya 贷款
item.description: Castlelake LP 已同意购买最初由 Pagaya Technologies LTD 创造的多达 10 亿美元的消费贷款，这是私人信贷借贷机构寻求扩大消费债务业务范围的最新举措。【原文：Castlelake LP has agreed to purchase up to $1 billion in consumer loans that were initially created by Pagaya Technologies LTD, the latest move by private credit lenders seeking to grow their footprint in consumer debt.】

item.title: 德意志银行支持的嘉实基金主席在调查中辞职
item.description: 中国最大的共同基金公司之一嘉实基金管理有限公司（Harvest Fund Management Co.【原文：Harvest Fund Management Co., one of the largest mutual fund firms in China, said its long-term chairman Henry Zhao Xuejun has resigned amid an investigation by Chinese authorities.】

item.title: 干邑 "出局"，龙舌兰 "入局"，饮酒者倍感压力
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的分析师认为，美国消费者正在从干邑白兰地转向龙舌兰酒，这进一步证实了该行的观点，即客户应该抛售人头马君度公司的股票。【原文：US consumers are switching from Cognac to tequila, according to analysts at Morgan Stanley, reinforcing the bank’s view that clients should sell shares of Remy Cointreau SA.】

item.title: 大跌之后，高盛AM的巴尔盯上了科技股和小型股
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）基本面股票客户投资组合管理全球主管卢克-巴尔斯（Luke Barrs）认为，美国股市大跌消除了市场上的 "大量泡沫"，使一些科技股和小盘股重新具有吸引力。【原文：The US equities selloff has removed “a lot of the froth” from the market, making some technology and small-caps attractive again, according to Luke Barrs, global head of fundamental equity client portfolio management at Goldman Sachs Asset Management.】

item.title: 紧张国债市场的混乱一周：收益率急转直下
item.description: 本周，美国国债在市场对经济衰退的担忧骤增和大盘崩溃的背景下大幅反弹，交易员们对前景进行了重新评估。【原文：A wrenching week for US Treasuries that saw bonds rally furiously amid surging recession fears and a broad market meltdown reversed course sharply as traders reassessed the outlook.】

item.title: 经济学家调查显示美联储拒绝巨额降息呼吁
item.description: 大多数接受调查的经济学家认为，9 月份的利率只会下降四分之一个点；这一结论与华尔街一些大型银行要求在下次会议上大幅降息的呼声相左。【原文：A large majority of economists surveyed see only a quarter-point decrease in interest rates coming in September — a finding that’s at odds with calls from some large Wall Street banks for a jumbo cut at the next meeting.】

item.title: 以色列资产引领新兴市场同行的停火赌注
item.description: 在以色列表示将派代表团参加与哈马斯的新一轮停火协议谈判后，以色列货币和美元债券在新兴市场中涨幅最大。【原文：Israel’s currency and dollar bonds posted some of the best gains in emerging markets after the nation said it will send a delegation to a new round of talks for a cease-fire deal with Hamas.】

item.title: 中国要求国有银行记录政府债券购买者信息
item.description: 中国监管机构要求一些国家最大的银行记录下它们所出售的主权债务的买家，这是一个微妙的迹象，表明当局正试图控制投机者，为前所未有的债券涨势降温。【原文：Chinese regulators asked some of the nation’s biggest banks to note down a record of the buyers of the sovereign debt that they have sold, a subtle sign that authorities are trying to rein in speculators to cool an unprecedented bond rally.】

item.title: 欧洲风起云涌，法国扩大削减核电的警告范围
item.description: 随着未来几天热浪的加剧，法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）可能会削减更多核反应堆的产量。【原文：Electricite de France SA is likely to cut production at more nuclear reactors as a heat wave intensifies in the coming days.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，中国将欧洲电动汽车关税诉至世贸组织
item.description: 中国已就欧盟对中国电动汽车征收反补贴税的决定正式向世界贸易组织提出申诉。【原文：China has formally launched a complaint to the World Trade Organization over the European Union’s decision to impose anti-subsidy duties on Chinese electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美国银行哈特内特称市场下跌尚未突破关键水平
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，全球金融市场的动荡尚未达到令人担忧经济硬着陆的程度。【原文：The turbulence in global financial markets has yet to reach proportions that would signal worries about a hard economic landing, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 德国企业破产率将创 2017 年新高
item.description: 一个游说团体警告说，德国 5 月份的破产数据比去年同期增长了近三分之一，目前有望突破 2017 年的水平。【原文：German insolvencies rose in May by almost a third from a year earlier, according to data that a lobby group warns is now on track to breach a level last seen in 2017.】

item.title: 人民力量抗议活动后，孟加拉国面临财政倒计时
item.description: 继数周血腥的街头抗议之后，孟加拉国临时政府的就职开启了政治不确定性的危险新阶段。【原文：Following weeks of bloody street protests, the inauguration of an interim government in Bangladesh kicks off a perilous new phase of political uncertainty — a potential threat to the country’s already shaky finances.】

item.title: Crown 放弃了悉尼顶层公寓 5900 万美元的名人代理权
item.description: 皇冠度假村有限公司（Crown Resorts Ltd.）准备重新推出其悉尼摩天大楼中一套价值 9000 万澳元（约合 5940 万美元）的顶层公寓，在该房产未能售出后，皇冠度假村将由新的销售代理公司负责。【原文：Crown Resorts Ltd. is poised to relaunch a A$90 million ($59.4 million) penthouse in its Sydney skyscraper under new selling agents after the property failed to sell.】

item.title: 传统玩具制造商如何在数字游戏领域大展拳脚
item.description:
孩之宝首席执行官谈《大富翁》、《魔法：收集》等游戏。【原文：

Hasbro's CEO on Monopoly, Magic: The Gathering, and more.

】

item.title: 瑞银手续费增长减轻了对传统业务的打击：欧洲、中东和非洲地区未来一周财报
item.description: 投资银行同行在第二季度的强劲表现为下周发布财报的瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）树立了很高的标杆。【原文：A strong second-quarter showing by investment banking peers sets a high bar for UBS Group AG, reporting next week.】

item.title: 中国建筑商凯撒面临避免破产的关键法庭考验
item.description: 周一，凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）将与债权人就其命运举行一场重要听证会，法庭可能会对中国最大的开发商之一进行清盘。【原文：Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. will square off with creditors in a crucial hearing Monday over its fate, facing a court that may be open to winding up one of the largest Chinese developers.】

item.title: 马来西亚的二氧化碳封存法案接受雨林国家的考验
item.description: 马来西亚联邦政府计划对二氧化碳储存进行监管，并将其转化为马来西亚石油生产经济的收入来源，但该计划正面临来自婆罗洲岛上两个州的阻挠。【原文：A plan by the Malaysian federal government to regulate carbon dioxide storage and turn it into a source of revenue for its oil-producing economy is facing roadblocks from two of the nation’s states on Borneo island.】

item.title: 捷克利率制定者担心 8 月会议上的克朗疲软
item.description: 根据 8 月 1 日的利率会议记录，捷克决策者对近期克朗贬值表示担忧，称这是进一步放宽货币政策需谨慎的一个原因。【原文：Czech policymakers voiced concerns about the recent koruna depreciation, saying it was a reason for caution in further monetary-policy easing, according to minutes from the Aug. 1 rate meeting.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气将因乌克兰过境风险而每周跳涨
item.description: 由于市场担心俄罗斯燃料过境乌克兰可能出现中断，欧洲天然气价格每周将跳涨近 10%。【原文：European natural gas prices are set for a weekly jump of nearly 10% as fears over possible disruptions to Russian fuel crossing Ukraine dominated the market.】

item.title: CVC 和 ADIA 将以 54 亿英镑收购 Hargreaves Lansdown
item.description: 一批私募股权收购者已同意收购 Hargreaves Lansdown Plc，该交易对英国投资平台的估值为 54 亿英镑（69 亿美元）。【原文：A group of private equity suitors have agreed to buy Hargreaves Lansdown Plc in a deal that values the UK investment platform at £5.4 billion ($6.9 billion).】

item.title: 挪威核心通货膨胀率降至2022年以来最弱水平
item.description: 挪威的基本通胀率降至两年多来的最低水平，这为政策制定者提供了保证，可能会推动降息。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation eased to its lowest level in more than two years, offering policymakers reassurance that could advance the case for an interest-rate cut.】

item.title: ClearBank 赢得许可，金融科技得以在欧洲扩张
item.description: ClearBank Ltd. 表示已获得银行牌照，允许该金融科技公司向欧洲客户提供实时清算和结算服务，这标志着这家英国公司向全球扩张迈出了第一步。【原文：ClearBank Ltd. said it received a banking license allowing the fintech to offer real-time clearing and settlement services to clients across Europe, marking the UK company’s first step toward global expansion.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数（FTSE 100）将上扬结束动荡一周
新兴市场货币升至两年多来最高点
item.description: 受美元走软和全球股市反弹的影响，新兴市场货币攀升至两年多来的最高点。【原文：Emerging-market currencies climbed to their highest in more than two years on the back of a weaker US dollar and a rebound in equities globally.】
